attributes.action: Ban Russian competitors from all events starting with Wimbledon
attributes.additional_details: Ban Russian competitors from all sporting events indefinitely until Russian military or mercenary forces withdraw to pre 2014 lines. Specifically Wimbledon in the first instance.
attributes.background: Ban Russian competitors from all sporting events indefinitely until Russian military or mercenary forces withdraw to pre 2014 lines. Specifically Wimbledon in the first instance.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about eligibility to take part in sporting events are a matter for the event organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
